MainArmor._COMMENT: What areas of the body do you want to protect? One or more of these options must be set to true.

HeadAreas._COMMENT: Enable these only if you want particular areas to be protected, otherwise 'Head: true' is enough to protect your head.
HeadAreas._Notice: This section is only valid if 'Head' is set to 'true'.

Resources._Suggestion: Keep repair cost at or below 100 unless you want the cost to go far beyond what you can afford.

TypeOfArmor._COMMENT: ONLY SET ONE OF THE FOLLOWING VALUES TO TRUE. THE REST SHOULD BE FALSE.

MaterialOfArmor._COMMENT: ONLY SET ONE OF THE FOLLOWING VALUES TO TRUE. THE REST SHOULD BE FALSE.

GodMode._COMMENT: Enable this to disable penetration of armor. (i.e., enabled = 0 throughput)

Blacklist._COMMENT: Set to true to remove chance of pmc bots spawning with this item in their inventory.
